content:
Great choice! The YHA Sydney Harbour is located in a fantastic location near many popular attractions. Here are some affordable activities and attractions to check out in the area:

1. The Rocks Markets: This market is located just a few minutes' walk from YHA Sydney Harbour and offers local crafts, food, and live music.

2. Sydney Observatory: This observatory is located in the historic area of The Rocks and offers tours and stargazing sessions for an affordable price.

3. Royal Botanic Garden: Just a 10-15 minute walk from the YHA Sydney Harbour, the Royal Botanic Garden offers free entry and beautiful views of the Sydney Harbour.

4. Circular Quay: This is the transportation hub of Sydney Harbour and has many affordable food options and street performers. It's also a great place to catch ferries to other parts of Sydney, like Taronga Zoo or Manly Beach.

5. Darling Harbour: This area is a short ferry ride or 20 minute walk from YHA Sydney Harbour and has many affordable restaurants, shops, and attractions like the Chinese Garden of Friendship and SEA LIFE Sydney Aquarium.

These are just a few of the many affordable attractions and activities in the area. Have fun exploring!
